import './productDetails.css'; import "slick-carousel/slick/slick.css"; import "slick-carousel/slick/slick-theme.css"; import { productSlider } from '../../dummyData'; import InfoSidebar from '../../components/infoSidebar/InfoSidebar'; import Sidebar from '../../components/sidebar/Sidebar'; import Slider from 'react-slick'; export default function ProductDetails() { return(

); }
